results.title: Enable monitoring for AKS clusters - Azure Monitor
results.description: Managed Grafana Azure Managed Grafana workspace Link your Grafana workspace to your Azure Monitor workspace to make the Prometheus metrics collected from your cluster available to Grafana dashboards.  ...metrics and container logging Note Using Application insightsPrometheus metrics Use the -enable-azure-monitor-metrics option with az aks create.

results.title: Overview of Azure Monitor with Prometheus - Azure Monitor
results.description: Azure Monitor and Prometheus Prometheus is a popular open-source monitoring and alerting solution that's widely used in the cloud-native ecosystem. Azure Monitor provides a fully managed service for Prometheus that enables you to collect, store, and analyze Prometheus metrics without maintaining your own Prometheus server. You can leverage....
